DOC.criteria: French Native language 18 year old old Signed consent Covered French social care system Unable participate administrative reason Psychiatric trouble Pain rest critical limb ischemia Unable walk ( ex : wheelchair subject ) Note : previous inclusion protocole note exclusion criterion new participation .
